---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/split-stake-account/get-flow-status-split-stake-account
pagination_next: null
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/730fbe4e-c4b4-480f-b3c5-4a25bfbd5cf3' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `split_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "730fbe4e-c4b4-480f-b3c5-4a25bfbd5cf3",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "source_stake_account_pubkey": "5YofNaQJ24cgp5hzJgMKSwi16188WiBgfdbWkxbG4FWP",
    "amount": "2.0",
    "split_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "skP46dMLV4qELAyiFZmxaUUtjfLdXPpGqNNu4HWzkDMUfyEBJTr3p7pzbg7FPVRnGPvtpiMqWgNKJMZ2dw7J6h3",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "source_stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "destination_stake_account_pubkey": "7m5fFsdZNdoifnmToR23rK14V2Yoxw3omD1V8vy21kXC"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-11-02T04:25:28.997Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-11-02T04:27:08.932Z"
}
```

### Split Stake Account Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully split your tokens into two separate accounts!
